Package com.orc.io

Interface Summary
MultiplexListener Interface for multiplexer call backs NIO channel has 4 callback operations: connect, accept, read, write This class provides a standard interface a multiplexer can use for callbacks
 

Class Summary
MultiplexAdapter This class implements MultiplexListener and allows an extending class to completely ignore channel opperations that are not relavent to the class It implements all the methods in MultiplexListener, but does nothing on callback
SimpleClientContext A client context keeps track of a client's socket's, callback keys and other data.
SimpleClientMultiplexer This is a simple multiplexer set up to assume the duties of a client connecting to a server.
SimpleServerMultiplexer This is a simple multiplexer set up to assume the duties of a server allowing multiple clients to connect.
